summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the improvement of E. Valley St. from 33rd Ave. E. to 36th Ave. E.; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys; by constructing underground utilities lines and a residential street lighting system; all in accordance with Res No. 25493 of the city council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
